test.name: Login Com Sucesso

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.msg: Location should have contained 'dashboard.html' but it was 'http://localhost:8000/index.html'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.
kw.status: Location should have contained 'dashboard.html' but it was 'http://localhost:8000/index.html'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: Location should have contained 'dashboard.html' but it was 'http://localhost:8000/index.html'.

test.name: Login Com Usuário Inválido

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=error-message' contains exact text 'Usuário ou senha incorretos.'.
The text of element 'id=error-message' should have been 'Usuário ou senha incorretos.' but it was ''.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.status: The text of element 'id=error-message' should have been 'Usuário ou senha incorretos.' but it was ''.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: The text of element 'id=error-message' should have been 'Usuário ou senha incorretos.' but it was ''.
